JOB-DA-FRESHER.title: Data Analyst
JOB-DA-FRESHER.description: Seeking a motivated fresher to join our analytics team. You'll work on data extraction, cleaning, and basic reporting while learning industry best practices.
responsibilities: Extract and clean data from multiple sources
Create basic reports and dashboards using BI tools
Perform exploratory data analysis
Support senior analysts with ad-hoc analysis
Document data processes and findings
Participate in team meetings and present insights
must_have_skills: SQL basics (SELECT, JOIN, WHERE, GROUP BY)

technical: Explain the difference between WHERE and HAVING clauses in SQL
How would you find duplicate records in a table?
What is a LEFT JOIN and when would you use it?
behavioral: Tell me about a time you had to learn something new quickly
Describe a project where attention to detail was critical

JOB-DA-MID.title: Data Analyst
JOB-DA-MID.description: Looking for an experienced Data Analyst to drive insights and support business decisions. You'll own end-to-end analysis projects and mentor junior team members.
responsibilities: Design and execute complex analytical projects
Build automated dashboards and reporting pipelines
Perform A/B testing and statistical analysis
Present insights to stakeholders and leadership
Mentor junior analysts
Optimize SQL queries for performance
Collaborate with engineering on data infrastructure
must_have_skills: Python or R for analysis (pandas, numpy, matplotlib)

technical: Explain window functions with a real-world example
How would you design a dashboard for executive leadership?
Walk me through your approach to A/B test analysis
behavioral: Describe a time you influenced a business decision with data
Tell me about a complex analysis project you owned end-to-end

JOB-DE-FRESHER.title: Data Engineer
JOB-DE-FRESHER.description: Join our data engineering team to build scalable data pipelines. You'll learn modern data stack technologies and contribute to our data infrastructure.
responsibilities: Assist in building ETL/ELT pipelines
Write SQL queries for data transformation
Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline failures
Document data workflows and schemas
Participate in code reviews
Support data quality initiatives

technical: What is the difference between ETL and ELT?
How would you handle duplicate records in a data pipeline?
Explain the concept of idempotency in data pipelines
behavioral: Describe a technical challenge you overcame
How do you approach debugging a failing pipeline?

JOB-DE-SENIOR.title: Senior Data Engineer
JOB-DE-SENIOR.description: Lead the design and implementation of enterprise-scale data infrastructure. Architect solutions, mentor engineers, and drive technical excellence.
responsibilities: Design and architect data infrastructure solutions
Build real-time and batch data pipelines at scale
Optimize data warehouse performance and costs
Establish data engineering best practices
Mentor junior and mid-level engineers
Collaborate with ML/AI teams on feature engineering
Drive technical decisions and roadmap planning
Ensure data security and governance compliance

technical: Design a real-time data pipeline for processing millions of events per second
How would you optimize a slowly performing data warehouse?
Explain your approach to ensuring data quality at scale
behavioral: Describe a time you architected a complex data system
How do you handle technical disagreements with peers?
Tell me about mentoring an engineer to solve a difficult problem

JOB-DS-FRESHER.title: Data Scientist
JOB-DS-FRESHER.description: Start your data science career building predictive models and deriving insights from data. Work alongside experienced data scientists on real business problems.
responsibilities: Build and evaluate machine learning models
Perform exploratory data analysis
Create data visualizations and reports
Assist in A/B testing and experimentation
Document model development and findings
Present results to team members

technical: Explain the bias-variance tradeoff
When would you use logistic regression vs decision trees?
How do you handle imbalanced datasets?
behavioral: Describe a data problem you solved with creative analysis
How do you explain technical results to non-technical stakeholders?

JOB-DS-SENIOR.title: Senior Data Scientist
JOB-DS-SENIOR.description: Lead high-impact data science initiatives that drive business value. Build advanced models, establish best practices, and guide junior scientists.
responsibilities: Design and implement end-to-end ML solutions
Develop advanced predictive and prescriptive models
Lead experimentation strategy and causal inference
Define modeling best practices and standards
Collaborate with engineering on ML infrastructure
Mentor junior data scientists
Present findings to C-level executives
Drive business impact through data-driven insights
must_have_skills: SQL and data manipulation at scale

technical: Design an end-to-end recommendation system for an e-commerce platform
How would you approach building a customer churn prediction model?
Explain your process for debugging a model that's underperforming in production
behavioral: Describe a project where your model drove significant business impact
Tell me about a time you had to balance model complexity with interpretability
How do you prioritize between multiple data science initiatives?

JOB-ML-JUNIOR.title: AI/ML Engineer
JOB-ML-JUNIOR.description: Build and deploy machine learning models in production. Work on ML infrastructure, model serving, and continuous improvement of AI systems.
responsibilities: Deploy ML models to production environments
Build ML pipelines and automation
Monitor model performance and drift
Implement feature engineering workflows
Collaborate with data scientists on model optimization
Write clean, maintainable ML code
Participate in model experimentation
nice_to_have_skills: MLflow or similar ML tracking tools
behavioral_focus_areas: Collaboration with DS and engineering teams

technical: How would you deploy a machine learning model as a REST API?
Explain your approach to monitoring ML models in production
What is model drift and how do you detect it?
behavioral: Describe a time you debugged a production ML issue
How do you balance speed of deployment with model quality?

JOB-ML-SENIOR.title: Senior AI/ML Engineer
JOB-ML-SENIOR.description: Architect and scale AI/ML infrastructure to support company-wide machine learning initiatives. Lead MLOps practices and drive technical excellence.
responsibilities: Design scalable ML infrastructure and platforms
Build automated ML pipelines (training, deployment, monitoring)
Establish MLOps best practices and standards
Optimize model performance and latency
Lead integration of LLMs and generative AI
Mentor ML engineers and data scientists
Drive technical roadmap for ML systems
Ensure model governance and compliance
nice_to_have_skills: LLM fine-tuning and deployment (Llama, GPT, Mistral)
Ray or Dask for distributed computing

technical: Design an end-to-end MLOps platform for a company with 100+ models
How would you optimize inference latency for a real-time prediction API?
Explain your approach to implementing a RAG system with LLMs
behavioral: Describe a time you scaled an ML system to handle 10x traffic
How do you approach technical decision-making for long-term projects?
Tell me about mentoring an engineer through a complex ML infrastructure challenge
